name: Tiledom
description:
Match 3 with a twist. Fun, relaxing and challenging!

Tiledom is a brand new tile matching game! It’s not an ordinary mahjong or match 3 game, but will offer you a completely new game play. Match 3 same tiles to solve challenging puzzles. It’s easy at the beginning and as you progress you will face a lot challenging levels. Game always need good logic and strategy to solve challenging levels. Once you master the skills, you will enjoy the exciting Tiledom game. Tiledom suits very well for all ages.

How to Play:

Tap and move any tile onto the board. Match 3 same tiles on the board to clear it. Do clearing as fast as possible for getting more XP points. Puzzle will complete when all tiles are cleared. Game will fails if you have 7 or more tiles on the board.

Tiledom is a free game, but it offers in game purchases. If you do not want to use this option, disable it on your device in the content restriction menu.
